mapper.sql: goodsSupplier.id as id , goodsSupplier.supplier_name as supplierName , goodsSupplier.supplier_short_name as supplierShortName , goodsSupplier.supplier_english_name as supplierEnglishName , goodsSupplier.linkman_name as linkmanName , goodsSupplier.linkman_sex as linkmanSex , goodsSupplier.linkman_age as linkmanAge , goodsSupplier.supplier_address as supplierAddress , goodsSupplier.business_scope as businessScope , goodsSupplier.linkman_phone as linkmanPhone , goodsSupplier.link_email as linkEmail , goodsSupplier.business_type as businessType , goodsSupplier.state as state , goodsSupplier.is_delete as isDelete , goodsSupplier.creator_id as creatorId , goodsSupplier.creator as creator , goodsSupplier.create_time as createTime , goodsSupplier.updator_id as updatorId , goodsSupplier.updator as updator , goodsSupplier.update_time as updateTime
mapper.insert:
insert into goods_supplier_tb
id,
supplier_name,
supplier_short_name,
supplier_english_name,
linkman_name,
linkman_sex,
linkman_age,
supplier_address,
business_scope,
linkman_phone,
link_email,
business_type,
state,
is_delete,
creator_id,
creator,
create_time,
updator_id,
updator,
update_time,
#{id},
#{supplierName},
#{supplierShortName},
#{supplierEnglishName},
#{linkmanName},
#{linkmanSex},
#{linkmanAge},
#{supplierAddress},
#{businessScope},
#{linkmanPhone},
#{linkEmail},
#{businessType},
#{state},
#{isDelete},
#{creatorId},
#{creator},
#{createTime},
#{updatorId},
#{updator},
#{updateTime},
mapper.update:
update goods_supplier_tb
supplier_name = #{supplierName},
supplier_short_name = #{supplierShortName},
supplier_english_name = #{supplierEnglishName},
linkman_name = #{linkmanName},
linkman_sex = #{linkmanSex},
linkman_age = #{linkmanAge},
supplier_address = #{supplierAddress},
business_scope = #{businessScope},
linkman_phone = #{linkmanPhone},
link_email = #{linkEmail},
business_type = #{businessType},
state = #{state},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
creator_id = #{creatorId},
creator = #{creator},
create_time = #{createTime},
updator_id = #{updatorId},
updator = #{updator},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
